title: I'm extremely disappointed in this community, and with people I play with.
body:
because nobody ever told me bard was so goddamn fun to play.

Shame on all of you.  Thought we were bros.

replies.body:
Yo, bard is fun to play.

If you get his winter skin his W altars become cups of hot cocoa that slowly rise up to a marshmallow.
My problem is that I keep KSing on him on accident.  Once you start gathering a decent number of chimes, his damage is through the roof for a support.  Was NOT expecting that.

I haven't tested it on the new rune system (been trying to catch up on my backlog of games) but if you get hextech revolver and a meep you can proc thunderlords with one auto. Amazing for poke.

How are you playing him? I would like to play him next time I am on.

I don't build any AP items on him aside from frost queens.  

I run comet, mana flow band, transcendence, scorch, zombie ward, and cheap shot.
Vayne mid is also really fun yo play
i really don't think bard is fun to play
